00042     struct DXTExplicitAlphaBlock;
00043     struct DXTInterpolatedAlphaBlock;

00050     class _OgreExport DDSCodec : public ImageCodec
00051     {
00052     private:
00053         String mType;
00054

00059         PixelFormat convertPixelFormat(uint32 rgbBits, uint32 rMask, 
00060             uint32 gMask, uint32 bMask, uint32 aMask) const;

00065         void unpackDXTAlpha(const DXTExplicitAlphaBlock& block, ColourValue* pCol) const;
00067         void unpackDXTAlpha(const DXTInterpolatedAlphaBlock& block, ColourValue* pCol) const;
00068

00071     public:

00074

00083
